about.description:
Experience the ultimate Los Angeles student lifestyle at Lorenzo-luxury off-campus housing near USC. Located just half a mile from campus, Lorenzo offers fully furnished apartments within a quick walk or free shuttle to USC. When you're not hitting the books, explore downtown LA hotspots like  Arena, LA Live, and the Fashion District-all just minutes away. Craving a beach day? Santa Monica Pier is only 14 miles from your front door. For the best student housing near USC, come home to Lorenzo-where your college experience gets an upgrade

48 Hour Maintenance Guarantee
We'll complete standard service requests within 48 hours of submission-or credit back your daily rent. See office for details.

All listed pricing is subject to immediate change without prior notice. Lease now to lock in this great low rate! The Lorenzo is an apartment community located in Los Angeles County and the 90007 ZIP Code. This area is served by the Los Angeles Unified attendance zone. Unique Features
about.title: The Lorenzo
Features: Socialize in the Outdoor Amphitheater/Athletic Field for Events
BBQ with Friends on One of the Five Rooftop Sundecks with Outdoor Grilling Stations and Picnic Area
Game On! Enjoy Two Professional SIze Indoor Basketball Courts
Meet and Greet Over a Free Cup of Coffee or Tea in One of Our Large Community Lounges
Don't Have a Roommate? We'll Match You With One.
Exclusive Cyber Cafe with Full Meal Plan
Medical Clinic Onsite Run By St. John's
Noise Reducing Concrete Slabs Between Floors
Walk-In Closets with Full Length Mirrors

about.description:
Looking for modern, convenient, and stylish student housing? Welcome to 1128 W 37th Dr  our newly constructed 7-story luxury co-living apartment, located just steps from the USC campus. With high-end finishes, fully furnished units, and unbeatable amenities, this is student living redefined.

Prime Location
 Only a 3-minute walk to USC campus
 Within DPS patrol zone and free USC Lyft area
 Close to USC Village, Target, Trader Joes Smart & Final, and various restaurants

Brand-New Luxury Building: Completed in 2025  one of the newest buildings in the area

Move-in ready with modern furniture:
 In-unit washer/dryer
 Smart locks for added security
 Sleek kitchen and bathroom finishes
 Elevator access to all floors
 Spacious rooftop deck with 360 views of Los Angeles Polaris LUX is an apartment community located in Los Angeles County and the 90007 ZIP Code. This area is served by the Los Angeles Unified attendance zone. Unique Features
